snippet.title: A Story About Farting | Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
Here's a game that will change the world of gaming! 💚 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2619940/A_Story_About_Farting/ 

A game that tells a touching and twisting story as old as the world. A story that affects both the poor and the rich. Women and men. Religious and secular people. Persons wise and foolish. Persons happy and sad. A story about farting! 💨

Here is a simple life simulator where you click and fart, but also more than that! You can get as many as 50 achievements here - both available in the game itself and on Steam. 💨😂

Click, fart, discover characters and new stories! 💨👀

Find out if this game really has an end! 🚀🥳

📌 Play and

💨 Unlock 50 achievements!
💨 Discover all the heroes!
💨 Take part in a wise and touching story!
💨 Share your thoughts on existence with other players!
💨 Fart and burp to your heart's content - that's what it's all about after all!  

STAY CONNECTED: 

💨 Facebook: facebook.com/profile.php?id=61553787351489 
💨 TikTok:  @lizardgamessstudio 
💨 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/lizardgamesstudio/
💨 Twitter: https://twitter.com/LizardGamesss


#astoryaboutfarting #meme #funny
